Description:
This bug appears on BIRT that starts up with eclipse 3.3M2 platform. The operation on setting and saving Bookmark or TOC will cause a SWT exception, indicates the Text for inputting string value has been disposed.

Steps to reproduce:
1.New a grid and select it.
2.Select the Bookmark on Property editor.
3.Setting a string value, such as "birt".
4.Save the above setting or change the focus from bookmark to other element.

Expected result:
Bookmark is set succesfully without any exception.

Actual result:
SWTException thrown

Exception Stack Trace:

Saving bookmark setting or change the focus will invoke setting the bookmark property. And in eclipse 3.3, after setting the bookmark property, the Text widget for bookmark will be disposed. At this time, calling "setText" method of Text widget causes the exception.
Fixed it by setting Text widget with new value before setting bookmark property.
